alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Prentiss; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 5:53PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Tishomingo, northeastern Prentiss and southeastern Alcorn Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 553 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Thrashers, or 8 miles northeast of Booneville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Booneville, Burnsville, Glen, Thrashers, Hinkle, Burton, Leedy, Rienzi, Paden, Strickland, Biggersville, Jobes, Gaston, Hazard Switch, Walker Siding, Holcut, Holts Spur and Altitude. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
